title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Monday Night Football and wonders who is the starting QB in New England? Ross Tucker joins the show to discuss Bill Belichick's strategy of not naming an official starter, and Patriots Insider Tom E. Curran tells Dan who he thinks will be the guy under center for the Patriots going forward. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
